mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MGV_PRODUCT ( PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_STOCK, PRODUCT_DISCOUNT, PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION, CAT_NO, PRODUCT_IMAGE ) VALUES (#{name}, #{price}, #{stock}, #{discount}, #{description}, #{category.no}, #{imagePath})
mapper.select: select A.PRODUCT_NO as no, A.PRODUCT_NAME as name, A.PRODUCT_PRICE as price, A.PRODUCT_STOCK as stock, A.PRODUCT_SOLD_OUT as soldOut, A.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION as description, A.PRODUCT_CREATE_DATE as createDate, A.PRODUCT_UPDATE_DATE as updateDate, B.CAT_NO as "category.no", A.PRODUCT_DISCOUNT as discount, A.PRODUCT_IMAGE as imagePath from MGV_PRODUCT A, MGV_PRODUCT_CATEGORY B where A.CAT_NO = B.CAT_NO order by A.PRODUCT_NO ASC

select A.PRODUCT_NO as no, A.PRODUCT_NAME as name, A.PRODUCT_PRICE as price, A.PRODUCT_STOCK as stock, A.PRODUCT_SOLD_OUT as soldOut, A.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION as description, A.PRODUCT_CREATE_DATE as createDate, A.PRODUCT_UPDATE_DATE as updateDate, B.CAT_NO as "category.no", A.PRODUCT_DISCOUNT as discount, A.PRODUCT_IMAGE as imagePath from MGV_PRODUCT A, MGV_PRODUCT_CATEGORY B where A.PRODUCT_NO = #{value} and A.CAT_NO = B.CAT_NO

select A.PRODUCT_NO as no, A.PRODUCT_NAME as name, A.PRODUCT_PRICE as price, A.PRODUCT_STOCK as stock, A.PRODUCT_SOLD_OUT as soldOut, A.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION as description, A.PRODUCT_CREATE_DATE as createDate, A.PRODUCT_UPDATE_DATE as updateDate, B.CAT_NO as "category.no", A.PRODUCT_DISCOUNT as discount, A.PRODUCT_IMAGE as imagePath from MGV_PRODUCT A, MGV_PRODUCT_CATEGORY B where A.CAT_NO = #{value} and A.CAT_NO = B.CAT_NO
